languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s next attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: Next Reaper's attack inflict bleeding on all targets hit by the attack with the damage equal to {uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} and immobilizes them for 1 round unless they make a successfull Toughness resistance check with a penalty equal to the {uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}. All enemies immobilized by Captive Audience act as full cover for all the Reaper's allies adjacent to them (including the Reaper if the Reaper remains adjacent to them).

The Bladedancer's next attack inflicts bleeding ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets hit. These targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} penalty or become immobilised for 1 round. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as full cover for the Bladedancer's allies (including the Bladedancer themselves) adjacent to those enemies.

The Bladedancer's next attack inflicts bleeding ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets hit. These targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} penalty or become immobilised for 1 round. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as full cover for the Bladedancer's allies (including the Bladedancer themselves) adjacent to those enemies.

The Bladedancer's next attack inflicts bleeding ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets hit. These targets must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} penalty or become immobilised for 1 round. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as full cover for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s next attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

languages.text: El próximo ataque del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) a todos los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g}. Dichos objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Todos los enemigos inmovilizados por Audiencia cautivada cuentan como {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura completa{/g} para el hoja danzante y sus aliados cuando están adyacentes a ellos.

These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

Dichos objetivos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の次の攻撃は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したすべてのターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d})を与える。これらのターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。囚われの観衆で移動不可になったすべての敵は、その敵に隣接しているブレードダンサーとその味方の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}フルカバー{/g}として数えられる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s next attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の次の攻撃は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したすべてのターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d})を与える。これらのターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗すると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。囚われの観衆で移動不可になったすべての敵は、その敵に隣接しているブレードダンサーとその味方の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}フルカバー{/g}として数えられる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}下次攻击会对所有{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（{uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}）。受影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。当刀锋舞者与盟友邻近被意乱神迷定身的敌人时，这些敌人会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s next attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}下次攻击会对所有{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（{uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}）。受影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。当刀锋舞者与盟友邻近被意乱神迷定身的敌人时，这些敌人会被视为{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}。

languages.text: La prochaine attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) à toutes les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Le danselame et ses alliés peuvent se servir des ennemis adjacents immobilisés par Auditoire captivé pour {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}se protéger de de tous les dégâts{/g}.

These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}. Le danselame et ses alliés peuvent se servir des ennemis adjacents immobilisés par Auditoire captivé pour {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}se protéger de de tous les dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: Der nächste Angriff des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) bei allen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Zielen. Diese Ziele müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} bestehen oder werden 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Alle von Unfreiwilliges Publikum gelähmten Gegner gelten für den Klingentänzer und seine Verbündeten als {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}volle Deckung{/g}, wenn sie an diese Gegner angrenzen.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s next attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

languages.text: Следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) на все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}. Цели совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Все противники, обездвиженные способностью Зритель поневоле, могут служить {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полными укрытиями{/g} для танцора смерти и его союзников, если те стоят на соседних клетках.

These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.

Все противники, обездвиженные способностью Зритель поневоле, могут служить {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полными укрытиями{/g} для танцора смерти и его союзников, если те стоят на соседних клетках.

Следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) на все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}. Цели совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Все противники, обездвиженные способностью Зритель поневоле, могут служить {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полными укрытиями{/g} для танцора смерти и его союзников, если те стоят на соседних клетках.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı'nın{/g} bir sonraki saldırısı, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} tüm hedeflerde {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) oluşturur. Bu hedefler, −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olurlar. Seyirciyi Esir Et kabiliyetinin felç ettiği tüm düşmanlar, onların bitişiğinde olan Kılıç Dansçısı ve onun dost birimleri için {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}tam siper{/g} olarak sayılırlar.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s next attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} ({uip|DamageTick|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d}) on all targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. These targets must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|ce30e102719a4671b660ffe5bff7c43d} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. All enemies immobilised by Captive Audience count as {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} for the Bladedancer and their allies when adjacent to those enemies.
